objects.specification: A large, flat square floor panel with a smooth, matte finish and subtle bevelled edges. Constructed from durable non-slip material to safely support heavy exhibits, it defines the booth perimeter and provides a refined industrial look suitable for indoor exhibition.

A flat vertical wall panel with a uniform painted surface and reinforced frame. Designed as a lightweight modular section with concealed joints to form a seamless enclosure, suitable for mounting graphics or banners.

A flat vertical wall panel with a uniform painted surface and reinforced frame. Designed as a lightweight modular section with concealed joints to form a seamless enclosure, suitable for mounting graphics or banners.

A detailed 3D model of a modern sedan car with smooth aerodynamic body contours, realistic wheel rims, tinted windows, and visible headlights. Finished in sleek metallic paint, it offers accurate proportions and fine surface detailing suitable for exhibition display.

A rectangular registration desk with a clean minimalist design, featuring a flat top surface and modesty panel. It has smooth edges and a durable laminated finish, providing ample workspace for staff and promotional materials.

A tall vertical display rack with three evenly spaced horizontal shelves and a slim powder-coated metal frame. The shelves feature inset ledges to secure brochures and accessories and present a minimalist industrial style.

children.specification: A thin flat shelf board with smooth edges and matte finish, featuring a subtle front lip to keep displayed items secure. Constructed of durable composite material.

objects.specification: A tall vertical promotional banner with rigid backing and matte printed surface showcasing brand logos and graphics. It has a slim profile frame to minimize visual weight and enhance readability.

A compact cylindrical spotlight housing with adjustable swivel mount. It provides a narrow, focused beam to highlight the demo car, and features a discreet heat sink and mounting bracket for ceiling installation.

A round table with a smooth circular top and central cylindrical pedestal base. Designed in a modern minimalist style with clean lines and a polished surface for casual visitor seating.

children.specification: A modern chair with a gently curved backrest and cushioned seat pad. It features four slender legs and neutral upholstery for comfortable visitor seating.

objects.specification: A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and multiple slender leaves arranged naturally. Housed in a smooth glossy ceramic pot to add a touch of organic warmth to the booth corners.
